ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Haha, I can see the message now: You are not experienced enough to put on this ring or would it be: Other adventurers would be jealous if you had this, so
ygData.messageBody:
Haha, I can see the message now:

"You are not experienced enough to put on this ring"

or would it be:

"Other adventurers would be jealous if you had this, so you better not
wear it"

or better yet:

"You have been twinked. Please report to the nearest Big Brother station
to have your gear stripped from you and burned. Have a nice day."

Then people couldn't win cool stuff in contests, win the lottery and buy
a neat high level weapon, duel a higher level character and grab some
cool booty. THAT would make the game no fun because isn't that what we
are about? To have fun? Or have I missed something?

Jay Hollums wrote:
>
> From: "Jay Hollums" <jhollums@...>
>
> Okay I have to comment, I have been Idle too long....
>
> If they had put in the mud's little trick of level based equip then there
> would never be any twinking...
>
> IE you cant put on that +25 mana ring till your 20th level....
>
> simple and perfect... problem solved...
>
> ps this has been in muds for DECADES (no I'm not exagerating this)
>
> Rutree
>
